name: CyberSlicer
description:
Welcome, Operative.

You are  a “slicer”, a freelance hacker specializing in infiltration and corporate espionage. 

Aside from infiltration gear, slicers carry a tab, deck or slab, specialised computers designed to stealthily find backdoors, hack using sophisticated AI software or just brute-force security systems.

You took a contract to break into and spy on a biotech firm’s research facility, to investigate reports of illegal experimentation.

*** Build will be updated soon with a more filled out and developed level, follow us to get notified! ***
